attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
participation in the entitlement to the lower tax rate for retired women at 60 ignores the fact that women at 60 are entitled to state pensions it seems to have been forgotten in the tax system with the removal of the 10p tax levy. the benifits are for 65+ pensioners(male) and exclude (female) pensioners at 60+
this seems to be sexual discrimination.it puts women of this age into a povery trap situation putting us outside the pension tax benefit if we have an employers pension as well  as a state pension.
i call upon the prime minister to address this situation at his earliest opportunity.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
